references.paper_title: A data-driven statistical model for predicting the critical temperature of a superconductor
references.reason: This paper provides a dataset used for a benchmark task in the paper, and is therefore highly relevant.

references.paper_title: Design-Bench: benchmarks for data-driven offline model-based optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces Design-Bench, a benchmark suite for offline black-box optimization, which is the core topic of the paper.
This paper introduces the core methodology, proxy-free diffusion, which is a foundation of the proposed method in the paper.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical background for score-based diffusion models, which are essential for understanding the core algorithm in the paper.

references.paper_title: Model inversion networks for model-based optimization
references.reason: This paper provides a baseline method for offline black-box optimization using model inversion, which the paper improves upon.
